abstract: The auction for Home Depot‘s supply unit may finally be heating up. Two private equity consortiums are planning to table offers of about $10 billion each for the contractor-supplies unit of the world’s largest home-improvement retailer, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The auction for Home Depot‘s supply unit may finally be heating up. Two private equity consortiums are planning to table offers of about $10 billion each for the contractor-supplies unit of the world’s largest home-improvement retailer, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Home Depot Unit to Get Bids from 2 Buyout Groups, Report Says
